summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CloudNest iteration 3 features. All new features verified working correctly: Admin Settings Email tab, PDF Invoice download, Password reset flow, Server control actions (code verified), Payment proof upload, Admin Orders with user details, Admin User Details page with tabs and Send Notification.
passed_tests: Backend: Health endpoint working
Backend: Plans endpoint working
Backend: User login working
Backend: Admin login working
Backend: Forgot password endpoint working
Backend: Reset password correctly rejects invalid token
Backend: Admin settings GET endpoint working
Backend: Email settings (SendGrid API key, sender email) update working
Backend: Invoices endpoint working
Backend: PDF invoice download returns application/pdf content type
Backend: Servers endpoint working
Backend: Server control correctly returns 404 for non-existent server
Backend: Payment proof upload working
Backend: Admin orders include user details (user_email, user_name, user_company)
Backend: Admin users endpoint working
Backend: Admin user details endpoint returns all tabs data (orders, invoices, servers, tickets, transactions)
Backend: Admin notify user endpoint working
Frontend: Forgot password page loads with email input and send button
Frontend: Forgot password form submission shows success message
Frontend: Reset password page shows 'Invalid Reset Link' when no token provided
Frontend: Reset password page shows password fields when token is provided
Frontend: Admin Settings page loads with all tabs (Company, Contact & Support, Email, Pages, Payment, Social)
Frontend: Admin Settings Email tab has SendGrid API Key and Sender Email fields
Frontend: Admin Orders page shows user details (name, email, company) for each order
Frontend: Admin Orders page has eye icon to view user details
Frontend: Admin Users page has view user buttons
Frontend: Admin User Details page loads with statistics cards
Frontend: Admin User Details page has tabs (Orders, Servers, Invoices, Tickets, Transactions)
Frontend: Admin User Details page has Send Notification button
Frontend: Send Notification dialog has subject and message fields
Frontend: User Billing page shows invoices with Download PDF buttons
Frontend: Order Details page shows Upload Payment Proof button for pending orders
Frontend: Payment proof upload dialog has proof URL and payment reference fields
Frontend: ServerDetails.jsx has Request Reboot and Request OS Reinstall buttons (code verified)
critical_code_review_comments: Server control actions create support tickets instead of actually controlling servers - this is by design and documented in the UI
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data from previous iterations

mocked_integrations.SendGrid: Email integration is MOCKED if SENDGRID_API_KEY not configured in environment
mocked_integrations.Server Control: Server control actions (reboot/reinstall) create support tickets - they don't actually control servers

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 3 features are working correctly. Key features tested: 1) Admin Settings Email tab with SendGrid API key and sender email fields at /admin/settings, 2) PDF Invoice download on /dashboard/billing page, 3) Password reset flow at /forgot-password and /reset-password pages, 4) Server control actions (Request Reboot and Request OS Reinstall buttons) on server details page - these create support tickets, 5) Payment proof upload on /dashboard/orders/:orderId, 6) Admin Orders page shows user details (name, email, company) for each order with eye icon to view user details, 7) Admin Users page has eye icon to view user details, 8) Admin User Details page at /admin/users/:userId with tabs for orders, servers, invoices, tickets, transactions, 9) Admin User Details has Send Notification button to email users. Note: Test user (test@test.com) has no active servers, so server control buttons couldn't be tested via UI but code was verified.
